articles.description: Kathy Griffin is home from the hospital following a major surgery in which half of her left lung was removed after she was diagnosed with stage one cancer. She was greeted by her excited dogs.
articles.content:
Kathy Griffin is home from the hospital following a major surgery in which half of her left lung was removed after she was diagnosed with stage one cancer.
